description:
I was having issues with a font (Liberation Serif) displaying as Greek characters in the PDF viewer that came with Ubuntu Software 3.28.1. Installing Fonty Python Font Manager appears to have immediately fixed the display and printing of the PDF document for my specific issue with no hassle. 

I didn't thoroughly consider all aspects of the tool, so I only gave it 4 stars, at no fault to the performance of the tool. Thank you.
I've tried three times to install this in Ubuntu 18.04.3 LTS - it will not launch. FORGET IT!
This used to be a very useful utility but, unfortunately, it no longer launches on Ubuntu 19.04 - shame.

summary: doesn't work on the lastest Ubuntu

description: It doesn't go beyond the logo in the splash screen
